I RAILWAY RECRUITMENT BOARD, CHANDIGARH raj 
GOVT. OF INDIA (MINISTRY OF RAILWAYS) 


Railwa Colon , Near Railwa Station, Chandi arh 

Website: www.rrbcdg.gov.in E-mail: bisht.dinesh@gov.in Phone No.: (0172) 2730093 Fax No.: (0172) 2730040 

Final result of various NTPC(Graduate) posts of CEN-03/2015 

I 

Based on the performance of the candidates in 1S Stage Computer Based Test conducted during 
28.03.2016 to 03.05.2016, 2nd Stage Computer Based Test conducted during 17.01.2017 to 19.01.2017, 
Typing Skill Test on 29.06.2017 and Aptitude Test on 30.06.2017 followed by Candidature and 
Documents Verification from 28.08.2017 to 02.09.2017 and 2nd & final call for DV on 12.09.2017 by this 
Board against CEN-03/2015, the candidates bearing following Roll Numbers have been found 
provisionally selected and placed on the panel (subject to fulfillment of eligibility conditions). Their Roll 
Numbers have been arranged below in ascending order horizontally (not in merit order):

i i 

L.­

It may be noted that merely empanelling a candidate does not in any way entitle him/her to any 
appointment in Railways as the empanelment is purely provisional and subject to further verification of 
antecedent and medical test to be undertaken by the appointing authority. 

While every care has been taken in preparing the above result, however, Railway Recruitment B.oard, 
Chandigarh reserves the right to rectify inadvertent error or typographical/printing mistake, if any Railway 
Recruitment Board, Chandigarh regrets inability to entertain any correspondence from unsuccessful 
candidates. The result is also available on the Notice Board of Railway Recruitment Board, Chandigarh. 

Page 2 of 3 




The selection letters to individual candidates are being sent separately. Appointment letters to the 
candidates will be issued by Northern Railway subject to his/her suitability in all respects, availability 
of vacancies, final verification of certificates and medical fitness etc. as per rules. However, Railway 
Recruitment Board, Chandigarh will not be responsible for the postal delay or wrong delivery, if any, in 
case of non-receipt of selection letter. 

Important: Candidates are advised to beware of fake website which may be of mis-guiding nature. 
Candidates are also advised to Logon to only the authorized website of Railway Recruitment Board and 
refer to instructions published in Centralized Notifications. 

Notice NO.08/2017 Date: 29.10.2017 Chairman, RRB/Chandigarh 

Page 3 of 3
